name: Loch Mars
description:
What a news!

THERE IS A LAKE ON MARS!
No, Donald Trump didn't launch a fake news this time, he launched one of his "Space Force" unit to conquer the lake by force (before Nestlé does it on paper).
But, player, be aware: some say a monster is living up there...
GoGoGo! PewPewPew!

Play with Mouse and ASDW keys or any standard controller twin-sticks.
